data.title: Hire OneRepublic for a Corporate Event or Performance Booking.
data.meta_description: OneRepublic booking agent to perform at a corporate event, business party, private function, fair and festival, or celebrity appearance. Learn how to hire OneRepublic for a alternative performance.
data.text:
Many performers, actors, speakers and other talent like OneRepublic in certain cases will consider virtual appearances via live streaming. They perhaps may accept lower fees too. If you are seriously interested in booking OneRepublic or other talent shown on our site, we will research their desire and the specific fee for your live-streaming event or project request.

OneRepublic's current work schedule and location in relation to your event's type, date, budget, and locality will play a primary factor in the acceptance of booking OneRepublic for your party. As long as your funding is commensurate with the price range to book OneRepublic, CTI will propose your event to the official agency representing OneRepublic. After we consult with them, we will provide a personal and accurate quote that includes: final costs, availability, and actual interest in being hired for your specific event or party.

CTI can give you the accurate OneRepublic booking price once we submit your event details to their camp. "How much does it cost to book OneRepublic for an event?" is a frequent question we get. The final OneRepublic booking price is contingent on many variables and the booking fee we may show is based on a range derived from our past experience with what will OneRepublic charge for an event. An example fee to book OneRepublic is in the starting range of $500,000-$749,000. However, any recent popularity change would cause a price fluctuation well beyond this example. Also, their speaking fee might be different than the fee shown for the cost to perform or to just appear. Popularity, career stage, along with current demand will cause fluctuations in their speaking price as well. The final booking price may be more than what is shown, but you should at least have a budget within that range for them to consider an appearance, performance or speaking engagement.
